title: Artigo AI
description: An AI-powered language learning platform designed to make learning fun and effective. Artigo replaces boring textbooks by generating infinite, personalized articles on any topic you love. It turns reading into an active learning loop with one-click translations, vocabulary saving, and a smart review system to ensure you never forget what you learn.

title: Local Google Drive Web-App
description: A locally hosted file storage system that mimics Google Drive functionality for free, offering users a personal file management experience. Built with Python and Django (using Celery and Redis for performance), it allows easy file upload, download, and sharing files with your friends.

title: Full Stack Web Application with Web Scraping
description: Developed a full-stack application using Flask for the backend (API), Angular for the frontend, and integrated web scraping. Implemented data storage in a cloud-based MySQL database.

title: Web-Scraping and Data Visualization
description: Using Selenium, this Python program scrapes CompuTrabajos website for job listings in your preferred city, saving the data in a MySQL database. Visualize the data with Matplotlib.

title: Python Music Videos Creator
description: A Python program that creates random videos with classical (or any) music, featuring images in various formats. Intended for a YouTube channel focused on relaxing music.

title: Free Room Website
description: Free Room Website provides students at Universidad de los Andes a platform to find free classrooms for quiet study.

title: Python Videos Creator About Any Topic
description: A Python program that creates YouTube videos with voice narration on any topic using ChatGPT for scripting and gTTS for audio.
